MAN.TITLE: lsq

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : Real or complex (m x n) matrix
: real or complex (m x p) matrix
: real or complex (n x p) matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: X=lsq(A,B) computes the minimum norm least square solution of the equation A*X=B, while X=A \ B compute a least square solution with at at most rank(A) nonzero components per column.

SECTION.label: References
SECTION.P: lsq function is based on the LApack functions DGELSY for real matrices and WGELSY for complex matrices.
